===Overview===
'''Kilgore Arms''' is one of the worlds leading weapons manufacturers. It was founded by [[Carlton Kilgore (Earth-616)|Carlton Kilgore]]. 

===Events===
His son [[Kade Kilgore (Earth-616)|Kade Kilgore]] spent two years blackmailing the board of his father's company to install him as the new C.E.O. Kade used a psi-blocking helmet and a light-bending wetsuit to sneak onto [[Utopia (X-Men Base)|Utopia]] and free [[Quintavius Quire (Earth-616)|Quentin Quire]] from his containment cell. After Quentin interrupted an arms control summit in [[Switzerland]] (which Kade's father was attending) by [[Telepathy|telepathically]] making the assembled diplomats reveal their dirtiest secrets on live television, Kade shot his father to death and dumped his body out of his flying car and into the mountains. With the resulting fear and general panic after Quentin's attack, The [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]] then toasted the 12-year-old as their new [[Black King]].{{r|X-Men: Schism #1}}

The [[Kilgore Sentinel (Earth-616)|Kilgore Sentinel]] was produced by Kilgore Arms.{{r|Avengers A.I. Vol 1 2}}
